𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥: 𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲✅

☘️ 𝐄 (𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧) = I love it because it helps me to relieve stress, especially after a long day of work and study. Moreover, I usually listen to a lot of pop songs of famous singers and bands.

𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥: 𝐃𝐢𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐮𝐥𝐭 🔥
☘️ 𝐒 (𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭) = When it comes to this question, I instantly think about pop music, which is the music genre I have fallen in love with since I was a kid.
☘️ 𝐄 (𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧) = There are so many reasons not to love it. But I guess I am a huge fan of pop music because it helps me to chill out, especially after a nerve-racking days of work and study.
☘️ 𝐄 (𝐄𝐱𝐚𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞) = There's actually one song that I often listen to and that is “Roar” by Katy Perry. It it not only catchy, but also has a very meaningful message of being fearless regardless of challenges ahead.
